Name: Support Request Closed
Subject: Your support request has been closed
HtmlBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Your support request has now been closed.

If you have any further questions or need additional assistance, please don’t hesitate to reply to this email.

Thank you for contacting us.

— The VirtualAddressHub Team
